duck: intense definition: existing in an extreme degree.
Intense is the fifth studio album by Dutch trance producer and DJ Armin van Buuren.

milestones: WHO: H1N1 influenza virus still a pandemic
Scores killed and wounded as violence escalates in Iraq

US Defense Secretary Gates to seek extra aid for Afghanistan
Strong winds and heavy rain across southern UK
British painter Lucian Freud dies aged 88

{{Infobox album | Name = Intense Type = Studio Artist = Armin van Buuren Cover = Intense.jpg | Caption = Released = Genre = Trance, progressive house Length = 1:19:11 Label | = Armada Music Producer = Armin van Buuren Last album = [[Mirage â€“ The | Remixes]]
(2011) This album = 'Intense'
(2013) Next album = Misc = | {{Singles Name = Intense Type = studio single 1 = Waiting For The Night | single 1 date = January 21, 2013 single 2 = This Is What It Feels Like single | 2 date = April 5, 2013 }} }} 'Intense' is the fifth studio album by Dutch trance producer and DJ Armin van Buuren. It was released on May 3, 2013.http://www.arminvanbuuren.com/news/2013/02/armin-announces-5th- artist-album-intense/ The first song announced to be on the album is "Waiting for the Night", featuring the singer Fiora, which was released on January 21, 2013http://www.beatport.com/release/waiting-for-the- night/1025773 as the theme song to the Dutch film Loving Ibiza (Verliefd op Ibiza) http://www.ibizathefilm.com/ The second song announced to be on the album is "Forever is Ours", featuring the singer Emma Hewitt.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c29bgvu4egI&list=PL0cWlO- yqP6_MbDgLpyOFGwZE7rXvBZQCN&index=4 The third song and first official single to be released is "This Is What It Feels Like", featuring the Canadian singer and songwriter Trevor Guthrie, was released on April 5th. The accompanying music video, featuring Ron Jeremy, was released on March 17th.http://www.arminvanbuuren.com/news/2013/03/video-teaser- new-armin-van-buuren-single/ On April 5th, the tracklist to Intense was announced by Armin van Buuren, and the pre-orders for the album also began.http://www.arminvanbuuren.com/news/2013/04/pre-order-intense-kicks- off-this-friday/ The album was first released exclusively on Spotify on April 29th, followed by its official release on digital and physical media on May 3rd.
wiki.title: intense
